name: Xinvora
description:
Xinvora is a 4-player fighting game inspired by the old style of Minecraft combat (swords to attack, snowballs and sticks to push enemies, fishing rods to attract them...).

In this you find yourself locked in an arena with 1 or more enemies that you will have to kill using your 2 weapons and your intelligence.

Each round you will have to change one of your weapons for the new one.
